Performance:
August 1978: The Murder in Revenge

Production: August 1978

Play: The Murder in Revenge (国言詢音頭)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Okawa River (大川 / Ōkawa)

The Mass Murder (五人伐 / Goningiri)

Characters:

Kikuno (Sakuraburo no Kikuno / 桜風呂の菊野)

Okishi (Nakai Okishi / 仲居お岸)

Kojoro, a maid (Kojorō / 小女郎)

Iheita (Wakatō Iheita / 若党伊平太)

Hatsuemon (Yashiba Hatsuemon / 八柴初右衛門)

Nisaburo (Eyano Nisaburō / 絵屋仁三郎)

Chushichi (Tadashichi), a jester (Taikomochi Chūshichi / 太鼓持忠七)

Tea house proprietor (Daijū no teishu / 大重の亭主)

Gennosuke (Otōto Gennosuke / 弟源之助)

Servant (Mukai no yakko / 迎いの奴)

Omisu (Iinazuke Omisu / 許嫁おみす)

Busuke (Warumono Busuke / 悪者武助)

Boatmen (Sendō / 船頭)
